# Diagnostics Docs

- [Administration and diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/index.md): Learn more about: Administration and Diagnostics
- [Configuring Your Application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/configuring-your-application.md): Learn more about: Configuring Your Application
- [ServiceModel Registration Tool](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/servicemodel-registration-tool.md): Learn more about: ServiceModel Registration Tool
- [Deploying Services](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/deploying-services.md): Learn more about: Deploying Services

## Message Logging

- [Message Logging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/message-logging.md): Learn more about: Message Logging
- [Message Flow Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/message-flow-overview.md): Learn more about: Message Flow Overview
- [Configuring Message Logging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/configuring-message-logging.md): Learn how to configure message logging, including how to enable logging, logging levels, message filters, and how to configure a custom listener in WCF.
- [Viewing Message Logs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/viewing-message-logs.md): Learn more about: Viewing Message Logs
- [Security Concerns for Message Logging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/security-concerns-for-message-logging.md): Learn more about: Security Concerns for Message Logging
